songs.title: I Rise (DJLW Remix)
songs.lyrics:
[Pre-Chorus]
I'm goin' through it, yeah
I know you see the tragic in it
Just hold on to the little bit of magic in it
I can't break down now
I can't take that now
Died a thousand times
Managed to survive
I can't break down now
I can't take that

[Chorus]
I rise, I rise
I rise up above it, up above it
I rise, I rise
I rise up above it all, all, all

[Drop]

[Pre-Chorus]
I'm goin' through it, yeah
I know you see the tragic in it
Just hold on to the little bit of magic in it
I can't break down now
I can't take that now
Died a thousand times
Managed to survive
I can't break down now
I can't take that

[Chorus]
I rise, I rise
I rise up above it, up above it
I rise, I rise
I rise up above it all, all, all

[Drop]
